Body: I am trying to run a "Hello World" app on my Motorola Droid Maxx. I am using Eclipse with the ADT bundle under Ubuntu 14.0.4. I am able to run the app on my old device, a Samsung Droid Charge, but when I try to select my new device using the Android Device Chooser, it tells me that the target is unknown. I have enabled USB debugging, and I have checked "Connect as Media device (MTP)". What is the next step to resolve this issue?
Title: Device Chooser cannot detect Droid Maxx?
